news.title: Yes Bank seeks buyers for Rs 4200 crore corporate and retail distressed loan book
news.para: Yes Bank has put some real estate developers for sale, such as ATS Realworth Pvt Ltd with debt of Rs 115 crore, ATS Infrastructure at 8 crore, ATS Township at Rs 26 crore, and Umritha Infrastructure at Rs 16 crore.

news.title: Enforcement directorate arrests another agent in Shine City fraud case
news.para: He was sent summons and asked to appear in Lucknow from where he was arrested after his credentials were verified and prima facie it was found that he had a hand in crime.

news.title: Kochi: Over Rs 11 crore fine collected from four stone quarries in November 2023
news.para: "Some have been imposed with a fine of Rs 2 to Rs 3 crore for the offence. There are some more quarries which are yet to remit the fine,” said a mining and geology department official.

news.title: NCLT admits IIFL Finance's claim against Satra Properties as financial debt
news.para: In 2022, the National Company Law Appellate Tribunal (NCLAT) had rejected a plea filed by the promoter of Satra Properties and upheld the ruling of the NCLT Mumbai bench to admit the company under the corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP).

news.title: Bengaluru: Illegal buildings in town planning department's radar
news.para: Ward engineers too swamped with work, so BBMP takes away task of taking action against those who violate approved building plans from their hands

news.title: Gurugram: Town planner steps up heat on illegal colonies, razes 11
news.para: During the drive, people gathered at the site and DTCP officials appealed to them that they should not invest their hard-earned money in such unauthorised colonies and should contact the office of the town planner for enquiries before buying and land.

news.title: Australia's Charter Hall Retail REIT sells two shopping centres for $148 million
news.para: Australia's Charter Hall Retail REIT will sell Southgate Square in South Australia for A$91 million, and Rosebud Plaza in Victoria for A$134.5 million.

news.title: Ashiana Housing plans to invest Rs 650-700 crore in FY24
news.para: Ashiana Housing is looking to add another 7-8 million sq ft over the next three years. In the next 5-5.5 years, the company has targeted to sell above Rs 12,000 crore of inventory.

news.title: CBI opposes statutory bail granted to DHFL's ex-promoters in loan scam case
news.para: ​A bench comprising Justices Bela M Trivedi and Satish Chandra Sharma was told by Additional Solicitor General (ASG) S V Raju, appearing for the CBI, that the charge sheet in the case was filed well within the 90 days statutory period and yet the statutory bail was granted to the accused.

news.title: Grihum Housing Finance looks to touch Rs 11,000 crore AUM by March 2025
news.para: "We will be around Rs 8,200 crore AUM by March 2024, Rs 11,000 crore AUM by March 2025 and clocking about Rs 13,000-14,000 crore AUM from March 2026 onwards," said Manish Jaiswal, managing director & CEO of Grihum Housing Finance

news.title: UP-RERA directs builders to get project accounts audited within six months of financial year end
news.para: In case of serious discrepancies or complains UP-RERA will get the accounts of the project audited by an auditor on the panel of the authority. The cost of such audit shall be borne by the promoter.

news.title: Aliste Technologies raises $1 million led by YourNest Venture Capital and Artha Venture Fund
news.para: The company recently entered the Bengaluru market. With the freshly infused capital, the company intends to spread its footprints pan-India.

news.title: Delhi generates maximum C&D waste in country, says CSE report
news.para: ​“Of the 131 non-attainment cities that have shared their city action plans on it, only 35 (26%) have data on C&D waste generation. Together, these cities have generated 6,563.5TPD C&D waste. Only eight cities have reported how much C&D waste they collect daily,” the report stated.

news.title: Nagpur: NIT set to raise development charges on gunthewari layouts by Rs 19 per sq ft
news.para: The development is a fallout of the Maharashtra government empowering all planning authorities across the state to implement the Maharashtra Gunthewari Development Act.

news.title: TDR must for land used to widen CDP roads, says Karnataka HC
news.para: Allowing a petition filed by CNC Mangalore-Kavoor Project Pvt Ltd, Justice Suraj Govindaraj ruled that authorities can use land owned by private individuals only by way of acquisition under Section 69 of the Karnataka Town and Country Planning (KTCP) Act, 1961.

news.title: Indian Bank offers to sell Rs 610-crore bad loans
news.para: The loans include exposures to real estate firm Ashvi Developers, LMJ International and ACCIL Corporation. The lender expects it would be able to recover at least a quarter of the value.

news.title: Haryana RERA appoints Arun Kumar as chairman of Gurugram bench
news.para: Parneet Singh Sachdev, retired IRS officer and former principal chief commissioner (income tax), will be new chief of H-Rera’s Panchkula bench.
